sentences: Junko Kido (木戸 順子, Kido Junko, 17 October 1956 - 4 January 2020), better known by her stage name Junko Hirotani (広谷 順子, Hirotani Junko), was a Japanese singer.
Hirotani lived in Tama, Tokyo, where she died of breast cancer at the age of 63 on 4 January 2020; her husband announced her death on Facebook the next day.
